# relevantDate

**Instance Property**

The date when the pass is most likely to be useful or necessary.

## Declaration

```swift
var relevantDate: Date? { get }
```

## Discussion

You can use this property for sorting UI elements that represent passes, such as cells in a table view.

## Getting the display attributes

- **icon**: The pass icon.
- **localizedValue(forFieldKey:)**: Returns the localized value for a specified field of the pass.
- **organizationName**: The name of the organization that creates the pass.
- **PKPassRelevantDate**

items.description: Returns the localized value for a specified field of the pass.
items.name: localizedValue(forFieldKey:)

items.description: The name of the organization that creates the pass.
items.name: organizationName
